00022   UVar::operator bool() const
00023   {

00095 # define SET(Type)                         \
00096   inline UVar& UVar::operator=(Type tv)    \
00097   {                                        \
00098     /*no need to copy, impl will do it*/   \
00099     check_();                              \
00100     UValue v(tv, false);                   \
00101     impl_->set(v);                         \
00102     return *this;                          \
00103   }

00111   SET(ufloat)
00112 # undef SET

00114   template<typename T>
00115   UVar& UVar::operator = (const T& v)
00116   {
00117     check_();
00118     UValue val;
00119     val, v;
00120     impl_->set(val);
00121     return *this;
00122   }

00187   inline void
00188   UVar::check_() const
00189   {
00190     if (!impl_)
00191       throw std::runtime_error("Invalid use of unbound UVar");
00192   }

00194   inline void
00195   UVar::useRTP(bool state)
00196   {
00197     rtp = state?RTP_YES:RTP_NO;
00198     impl_->useRTP(state);
